description: 1 if n is a prime power p^k (k >= 0), otherwise 0.
comments: Characteristic function of unit or prime powers p^k (k >= 1). Characteristic function of prime powers p^k (k >= 0). - _Daniel Forgues_, Mar 03 2009See A065515 for partial sums. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 22 2009a(A000961(n)) = 1; a(A024619(n)) = 0. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 17 2011If n>=2, a(n)=A069513(n). - _Jeppe Stig Nielsen_, Feb 02 2016
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Dirichlet generating function: 1+ppzeta(s). Here ppzeta(s) = sum(p prime, sum(k >=1, 1/(p^k)^s)). Note that ppzeta(s) = sum(p prime, 1/(p^s-1)) = sum(k >= 1, primezeta(k*s)). - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Sep 11 2005.a(n) = 0^(A119288(n)-1). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 13 2006a(n) = if A001221(n) <= 1 then 1 else 0. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 28 2015
mathematica: A010055[n_]:=Boole[PrimeNu[n]<=1]; A010055/@Range[20] (* _Enrique PÃ©rez Herrero_, May 30 2011 *){1}~Join~Table[Boole@ PrimePowerQ@ n, {n, 2, 105}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Feb 02 2016 *)
prog: (PARI) for(n=1,120,print1(omega(n)<=1,","))(Haskell)a010055 n = if a001221 n <= 1 then 1 else 0-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 28 2015, Mar 19 2013, Nov 17 2011
crossrefs: Cf. A069513 (1 if n is a prime power p^k (k >= 1), else 0.)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 12 2008
Comment re Galois fields moved to A069513 by _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Nov 02 2009
